title: Gas: natural energy
creator_credit: Michael Robertson, Australian Gas Light Company and Michael Robertson Film Productions
brief_description: An animated film which utilises felt-tipped pens and examines the pace of change, and points out that half of all the energy consumed by society has been used in the past fifty years. Narrated by Reginald Glanvill, with animation by Film Graphics P/L.
